title: The Intra-Party Landscape, Seen From The Edge Of Primary Season
teaser: Three states go to the polls Tuesday, starting what will be an eight-week stretch of primaries in the U.S. For a look at the intra-party political landscape, NPR's Charlie Mahtesian has this overview.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
